lines.text: Evil spelled backwards is live!
All right. What do you want me to tell you? Get a fuckin' divorce, then.
Divorce is fuckin' evil, Ritchie. You got some fuckin' really bad advice.
Evil spelled backwards is live.
You're a corny fuck, you know that?
Come on, get in the car. Please, baby.

Baby? Don't you dare "baby" me! I'm gonna wait here! I'm gonna wait here until somebody comes along. You know what? I'm gonna wait until some soul brother comes along in his big black Cadillac. And you know and I know that he's got a big black dick too.
Don't talk like that, just get inside the car.
Oh, fuck you!
Please, please, don't make me have to beg you. Come on- don't make me have to hurt you.
Hurt me? Don't you lay a fuckin' pinkie on me!
And now I'm just cheatin' a lot more than I ever did. But I thought- you know, I thought the man up there understood. I thought he under- would fuckin' understand...
God has nothing to do with this, Vin!
Yes, he does. Yes, he does.
Fuckin' make me sick, you fuckin' slut.

I am a slut? You're calling me a slut? You lowlife piece of shit- you fucked- my- cousin! You didn't think I knew about that! I smelled her pussy juice all over your fuckin' face! You fuckin' sick bastard! How dare you? And all this time I'm thinking there's something wrong with me. You perverted sick fuck!
Kill. Kill. Kill.

[crying]
And I've made some bad calls, and I'm a bad fuckin' husband. And I admit it. And I know you can't get away with shit in life anymore. You know, God sees everything, plain and simple... and I just want you to give me another chance.
No.
Please, baby. Give me another chance. I can't live without you- please.

[crying]
You can't bring God into this. You can't do that anymore...
Vinny! You fuckin' traitor! What the fuck are you doin'?
[Dog is barking and the Son of Sam is sobbing and trembling]
How did you get in here? Leave me alone! What do you want?
I want you to go out and kill. Kill.
No -
Kill!
[the Son of Sam is still trembling]
KILL!

[murmurs something inaudible]
I will kill. I will... I'll do anything you say. I'll do anything you say! Yes, master! I will kill! I WILL KILL!
I can't be a whore! I'm a man!

[to Ruby]
Damn, girl, you make me wish I was a lesbian.
[Tony and Joe T. run into a punk walking the street]
Watch where you're going, you freak!
Fuck you, guido.
...what did you say to me?
FUCK YOU GUIDO!
Alright, you're drunk, so I'm going to give you one more chance. Who's your favorite baseball team?
Boston Red Sox!
[They attack him]

[British accent]
You ain't Bruce Lee. Stop kicking Woodstock.
Yeah, they suck really good. Just like you, Ruby.
Come on. Relax.
Yeah, I learned from your mother, dick.
You gonna let your sister talk that way to me?
She's my half-sister.
Come on. Get lost.

[English accent]
It's all in the at-titude.

[mimicking]
In the at-tit-ude...
Hey, Ritch, why buy the cow when everybody else is gettin' the milk and steaks for free?
I like the cow.
You wanna watch, Vinny? Will that turn you on, Vinny? You linguini dick motherfucker! You wanna watch?
Since when does your hairstyle determine whether or not you're a fuckin' killer?

[crying]
I thought that what we had was special together.
Oh, baby- it is special. Let me make love to you, and I'll show you.

[continuing]
Just you and me... just you and me...
It is just you and me!
It wasn't- it was everybody.
Oh, baby, it wasn't...
It was everybody...
I didn't care for those fucking bitches! I love you!
It was everybody. And everybody else knew but me.
Congratulations! You just realized you were married.
I mean, I'm smart, I'm young, I'm pretty, you know...
Yeah, well, you got two out of three right there.
Shut up.
You know that song "Baba O'Riley"?
Uh huh.
That's my favorite song. You know who wrote that?
Englebert Humperdinck?

[long pause]
Mm-mm.
What? You don't think I know? Come on, I know. Pete Townsend.
Where are you goin'?
I'm gonna go.
I didn't say to go.
Well, you didn't exactly say you wanted me to stay.

[quietly]
Stay.
Can you tell me what he likes? Because I want to make him happy but I don't think he is.
You want me to tell you how to fuck your husband?
Yeah.
Now that I've got you, who've I got?

[smiling]
You know.
No, I don't. Why don't you tell me?

[still smiling]
I'm Sam. Dave Berkowitz.
Go ahead. Blonde me.
